author: arkurth
msg: Accidentally left section of State.pm commented out for testing in last commit.

author: arkurth
msg: Added code to State.pm::state_exit to check the state of computers when the parent of a cluster request exits. If the request failed, the state of computers assigned to child reservations which did not fail could be left in 'reloading'. If this is the case, the parent changes the state to available.

author: prasanthj
msg: HIVE-9471: Bad seek in uncompressed ORC, at row-group boundary. (Mithun Radhakrishnan reviewed by Prasanth Jayachandran)
